commands.name: az boards work-item relation add
commands.syntax:
az boards work-item relation add --id
                                 --relation-type
                                 [--detect {false, true}]
                                 [--org]
                                 [--target-id]
                                 [--target-url]

commands.name: az boards work-item relation list-type
commands.summary: List work item relations supported in the organization.
commands.syntax:
az boards work-item relation list-type [--detect {false, true}]
                                       [--org]

commands.name: az boards work-item relation remove
commands.syntax:
az boards work-item relation remove --id
                                    --relation-type
                                    --target-id
                                    [--detect {false, true}]
                                    [--org]
                                    [--yes]

commands.name: az boards work-item relation show
commands.summary: Get work item, fill relations with friendly name.
commands.syntax:
az boards work-item relation show --id
                                  [--detect {false, true}]
                                  [--org]
